feature: Update GitHub Link from abediaz to abe238

phases.name: Update GitHub Link
phases.description: Search for and replace all instances of old GitHub URL with new URL

subtasks.description: Search for all instances of https://github.com/abediaz

verification.run: Search results show all affected files

subtasks.notes: Completed search. Found 2 instances of https://github.com/abediaz in index.html (lines 699 and 711). No @abediaz GitHub handle references found. Other abediaz references are for LinkedIn (linkedin.com/in/abediaz/) and website domain (abediaz.ai) which should not be changed.

subtasks.description: Replace all instances of https://github.com/abediaz with https://github.com/abe238

verification.run: Verify all links updated and functional in browser
